p: Both chlorotypes and nuclear ribotypes failed to reflect obvious phylogeographic structure using the STRUCTURE program. CpDNA analyses of molecular variance (AMOVA) indicated that only 0.80% of this variation was observed among T. austromongolica and T. chinensis (TableÂ 2), whereas 96.26% of the variance was intra-populational. For ITS dataset, the AMOVA showed that 75.46% of the variance was within populations.
